jld.title: Justia Elevate Platform Updates
description: The Justia Elevate platform was recently updated to incorporate upgrades that improve your siteâ€™s pages and structured data, and enhance the overall Justia Elevate platform user experience. Additionally, you now have the ability to easily reorder your pages, and incorporate videos from additional video providers in the video stripes.
jld.title2: Your Premium Yoast SEO Was Updated
description2: Your Yoast SEO plugin was upgraded to the latest and greatest! This new version includes SEO analysis improvements, background indexing, better tracking of your cornerstone content, and a new readability asessment.
description3: Justia Elevate now includes an enhanced version of the Yoast SEO Redirect Manager. This upgraded plugin offers improvements that help avoid redirect loops and redirect chains in key scenarios.o
